page.para: Ra/ni was ex/cit/ed on her first day of school.
Lots of oth/er chil/dren were go/ing to school too.
Soon Ra/ni and her moth/er ar/rived at the school.
It was time for Ra/ni to say good/bye to her moth/er.
Sud/den/ly Ra/ni did not want to go to school an/y/more.
The teach/ers un/der/stood how hard it was and want/ed to help Ra/ni.
One of them walked o/ver and in/vit/ed Ra/ni to go to her class/room.
Ra/ni felt much bet/ter and she was read/y to go to school.
